channel.title: Fiction on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Fiction on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: It
item.description: From 2003: . . It suffered times when It almost drowned in the unruly sea, in wild tempests. The sharp, icy jagged teeth of Cruelty

item.title: Cockroaches
item.description: From October 2008: You may not have heard this story before but I’m sure if you look hard enough inside you, it will seem familiar. I knew it before it happened but I didn’t know I did, till it did.

item.title: Walking Home
item.description: Written in 2003 It was just another day and she was returning from school. After a long ride, the bus reached the last stop. Several students got off along with her.
